activities: Personal information received from Switzerland. (1) Sonic Foundry hosts and administers client-uploaded content (primarily, but not exclusively, video content) for clients in various industries throughout the world, including Switzerland; (2) Sonic Foundry collects and processes personal information of independent contractors in Switzerland for purposes of contract administration and satisfying contractual payment obligations; (3) Sonic Foundry collects and processes personal information received from customers and potential customers through the Sonic Foundry website for purposes of responding to inquiries and/or webinar registration.
personaldata: Sonic Foundry processes customer contact information, usernames/IDs of individuals authorized to view hosted customer content, personal information received from independent contractors for purposes of satisfying payment obligations and/or contract administration, and the contact information of webinar registrants and/or other customers seeking information from Sonic Foundry.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
